articles.title: Coal linkage rationalisation saves ₹6,420 crore annually for thermal plants - BusinessLine
articles.description: The Coal Ministry on Friday said that rationalising linkages to reduce the distance between mines and 73 thermal power plants (TPPs) has resulted in rationalising 92.16 million tonnes (MT) of the commodity with annual potential savings of around ₹6,420 crore.

articles.title: Basilic Fly Studio IPO: Offer subscribed 26.08 times on Day 1 - Moneycontrol
